result.title: Threat Modelling & Risk Assessment Methodology
result.description: This deliverable provides the normative specification of a meta-model which will be used by security analysts in order to capture the cartography of a QR TPM supported environment and the non-normative specification of a multi-step RA methodology that has to be applied prior to the risk quantification. It also provides the approach for integrating multiple levels of risk analysis and dependencies such as safety.

result.title: Report with the definition and requirements of three case studies
result.description: D.2.1 Report with the definition and requirement of three case studies (M12-SIEMENS): Report under task T2.2 with two parts: 1) Definition of the case studies with all considered scenarios including economical and technological assumtions. 2) Specification of requirements for modeling and simulation tools in order to execute the case studies.

result.title: New version of the StOpt library adapted to and integrated in Plan4Res Platform
result.description: D5.2 New version of the StOpt library adapted and integrated in Plan4Res Platform (M15,25,36-EDF): Software library under Task5.2.1. This library comprises stochastic optimisation solvers which will be adapted to the mathematical problems that have to be solved in the project for the seasonal storage and transmission expansion problems. It will be updated in M25 and M36
